title: Requesting a rideshare vehicle
context: Order a car through a smartphone app to pick you up.

content.bestLine: I'd like to order a car through the app

neutral.text: Can I get a ride to the airport?
I need a car to pick me up now
How do I request a vehicle?
I'd like to book a car for tonight
Can you send a car to my location?
I need to order a ride to the city
How do I use the app to get a car?
I'd like to request a vehicle for tomorrow

informal.text: Hey, can you get me a ride?
I need a lift to the party
Can you send an Uber to my place?
I'm trying to get a car to the beach
Can you help me order a ride?
I need a car to pick me up ASAP
How do I get a car through the app?
I'm trying to book a ride for later

formal.text: I would like to request a vehicle for transportation
Can you please arrange for a car to pick me up?
I require a ride to the airport for my flight
I would appreciate it if you could book a car for me
Can you assist me in ordering a vehicle through the app?
I need to arrange for a car to take me to the city

patterns.template: I'd like to order a car to [location]
patterns.meaning: requesting a ride to a specific location
requesting a specific type of ride to a location

dialogs.description: Requesting a ride through the app

lines.speaker: App
